item.title: Guess it's time to learn chinese...
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
chenmozx:

Actually those Chinese threads are ads, same as the Korean ones, no need to pay attention to them, just notify the administrators to delete them. These threads should all be automatically sent by bots, they can be seen almost everywhere in all the forums in the world.

I don’t even need them reported. It’s very difficult to miss them, and I delete them on site.

They help Hubicorn though.

Read full topic

item.title: Guess it's time to learn chinese...
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
I just had to re-confirm my email, so I dunno if that’s something the mods have put in place to deter throwaways, someone tried to access my account, or just a hiccup in the login system.
Hopefully they’ll get this under control soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Guess it's time to learn chinese...
item.dc:creator: Nonimportantuser
item.description:
I thought this issue was fixed back in December, guess i was wrong.

EDIT: i made a dummy account under the username TestDummy a few days ago. You don’t need a steam account now.

For a while after Decembers spam attack i think some users, including myself, had to have a steam account to even log in.

This needs to be fixed, its getting ridiculous.

Read full topic
